posts.post_content:
Hi All,

Working on completing the back set and just purchased this Tolstoi Devore. Since I am working on the complete set as well, I try to avoid buying duplicate cards just for the sake of the back. 

Of course I forgot I already had a Devore, so I am looking to trade this one for a comparable Tolstoi of a different player. I would also consider old mills and other mid range backs. 

Thanks!
